thread.title: Demons of Death gang arrested in UAE
thread.title_full: Demons of Death gang arrested in UAE

title: Demons of Death gang arrested in UAE
text: Amira Agarib /Ras Al Khaimah   07.14 pm Share Vote The gang used social media to sell drugs that caused abortion. The Ras Al Khaimah police have arrested a gang named Demons of Death in the emirate.The gang specialised in selling abortion-inducing drugs via social media, Brigadier Abdullah Ali Goad, director of Criminal Investigation Department at Ras Al Khaimah Police, said.The gang was given this name because of the ugliness and seriousness of the crime they were involved in, he added.The gang comprised Arab men who exploited social media websites and modern technology for promotion and sale of the prohibited drugs, which not only caused abortion in women but also posed a great risk to women's lives. Amira Agarib
